video_prompt: A young woman in a recording studio adjusts headphones, her hand moving across a mixer. She subtly shifts her gaze upward, her lips parting. Loose strands of her dark hair gently sway. The background's sound wave patterns subtly ripple. Soft lighting dynamically highlights her face and sweater texture.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** Medium shot, young woman in a recording studio, bust-up, angled left, looking up right, fair skin, high cheekbones, dark eyebrows, parted dark peach lips, dark hair in a bun with loose strands and halo backlight. Wearing black "DIKE" headphones (one on ear, one on shoulder) and a light off-the-shoulder knit sweater. Left hand on headphone, right hand on mixer. Microphone with black pop filter present. Out-of-focus background with sound wave design. Soft, warm lighting, subtle shadows. Warm color palette: beige, brown, black with gold/silver accents. Professional, creative, elegant.
refined_video_prompt: A woman's hand moves, adjusting headphones and then gliding across a mixer. Her gaze subtly shifts upward as her lips part. Loose strands of her dark hair gently sway. Background sound wave patterns subtly ripple. Soft lighting dynamically highlights her face and the texture of her sweater.
